body.name: TONOR Conference USB Microphone for Computer PC, Omnidirectional Condenser Laptop Mic for Video, Recording, Skype, Online Class, Court Reporter, Plug & Play Compatible with Mac OS X Windows
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 13 mins
features: Omnidirectional Microphone - It is not a Speaker or Speakerphone, it is a condenser microphone. The microphone has an omnidirectional pickup pattern with a pickup distance of 11.5 ft, making it easy to capture the most subtle sounds from 360° directions and transmit the sound more loud and clear. Participants can hear each other without raising their voices.

Made for Conferences - This microphone is perfect for small or medium meetings over an internet network by using Skype/GoToMeeting/WebEx/Hangouts/Fuze/VoIP/Zoom and other softwares. You can also use it for court reports, seminars, remote training, business negotiations, video chats, etc.

Plug & Play, No Drivers Required - The microphone is compatible with all operating systems - both Windows and macOS. You just need to plug the microphone to start recording. If there is no response after inserting the mic, please go to the microphone setting of your computer and select the mic as the INPUT device.
Convenient Mute Button - Quickly mute/unmute your microphone. The built-in blue indicator light for checking whether the USB microphone is working.

Well Designed Cable, Durable - The microphone is constructed of sturdy and durable metal material and the base is fitted with an anti-slip mat which keeps it stable on desktop during use. It is small, convenient and does not require much space when in use. Connected with a 1.8m nylon shielded wire, it effectively eliminates signal interferences to achieve the best recording results.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Omni-directional Pickup With an ultra-long distance pickup pattern and a radius of around 11.5ft. The voices of all the members of the meeting will be clearly recorded. One Button Mute Soft blue-light touch button that can be used to mute the microphone when required. Low Noise & Clear Sound The mic is designed with anti-noise tech allowing you to get the fully loud and clear sound without noise interference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Now that the world is on Zoom, this little gadget is a LIFESAVER!
reviews.reviewText: So for whatever reason, the microphone in my laptop stopped working well. Everyone one video calls would complain that I sounded quiet and far away, or that they couldn't hear me at all even though I was unmuted and everything. This happened on Facebook, Google Meets/Hangouts, Zoom, didn't matter what platform it was. It drove me CRAZY, so I started using earbuds with an external microphone, but that's no good for when my partner and I want to call someone together. Enter, this external mic.I now use it even when I'm on a video call alone because the sound quality is better than the inline mic on my earbuds. It's wonderful to just be able to talk normally, not shout or struggle or have to type out what I want to say because no one can hear me. I don't mean to be melodramatic, but this item has improved my quality of life since the pandemic. Video calls suck, but they suck a lot less when people can actually hear you. I don't get complaints about my sound quality or volume anymore and I can just speak naturally on video calls. This works with my Dell computer that runs Windows 10 as simple plug-and-play, as advertised. I didn't have to download anything or do any setup at all, just push the button on the device so that it glows blue and if necessary make sure the video platform has the device selected as audio input. I'd highly recommend this as an easy to use and good quality solution for video calls, especially if you have one or more people sitting with you in the room and you want everyone to be heard clearly. We haven't really tested the limits of the range, but it works great if my partner and I are sitting around the kitchen table or on the couch together; the people on the other end can hear both of us just fine. This is quite possibly the best $40 I've spent this year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement for a laptop microphone
reviews.reviewText: All my laptops have had built in cameras and microphones, but several of them have only been able to pick up sound directly in-front of the screen. That seems good, but sometimes my wife and I want to have teleconferences together, and just being off to one side would make it so we couldn't be heard. This is great at being a conference mic. Multiple people can sit around a table, talk normally, and still be heard. I have even gotten up and walked across the room to get stuff, and I can still be heard as long as I raise my voice a little. None of my laptop microphones ever allowed that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great but wish it turned red on mute
reviews.reviewText: This works fantastic sitting under a monitor for Teams calls, without any feedback from the speaker sitting right next to it. I love the silent mute button, but I wish it turned red on mute instead of just the blue light turning off. So easy to not notice you're muted without a clear indicator.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in May 2020 once it was evident I would be working from home for an extended period. I'm on conference calls or video conferences almost all day long and needed a good quality mic that would also block out background noise since I don't work in an enclosed room where I can close the door. I read a review where someone indicated they were looking at purchasing commercial grade conference call equipment for an office environment for a substantial and decided to try these instead since there was a considerable cost savings. It worked out so well, these mics became their permanent solution. That sold me so I tried one and it delivered on every aspect. The quality is fantastic and the best part is I can literally be inches away or 10 feet away and picks up my voice clearly yet filters all the background noise. I can talk in a normal voice as if everyone else is in the room with me and yet it does not pick up the clicking of my typing unless it's right next to the keyboard. After using it daily for almost 2 years now, I would highly recommend this microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I purchased one for the home group of a zoom bible study. Unfortunately I wasn't able to make the 4 hour drive to make it that weekend but I was able to send it with someone else the following weekend. The thing is, I'm the "tech guy" for the group. The fear that came over the face of the one who turns everything on when I told them I needed their help to set up the mic, well, I couldn't help but laugh. I got it with a usb extension cable so that it could be moved closer to the group seating. I talked them through plugiing the mic into the extension and then switching it out with the other mic. Zoom doesn't automatically stwich microphones, so I talked them through that and turning it up in the in the Zoom settings. Bingo, it was the clearest they have been since I first them up. On one computer and camera so we could see everyone at once. Simple and easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Keeps turning on by itself
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty decent microphone that I use for work as I conference with a lot of other teams. Only problem is that even when my macbook is in sleep mode and I press the power button on the mic, it will randomly turn on again after 5-10 minutes with its annoyingly bright blue light. I have no idea why or how thats even possible but its very noticeable at night when Im trying to sleep. Unplugging it is way too much of a hassle with my setup, otherwise its a good mic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for conference calls
reviews.reviewText: Great for people that dont want to wear headphones or earbuds for people that work from home using a computer. Great sound quality and the blue light on the unit is easily turned on and off by lightly touching the speaker. Would definitely purchase again!
Bought for zoom conferencing and it worked great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I am using this to enable my youth group meetings to take place in hybrid format - with some young people joining online and some joining in-person, as I'm aware my laptop microphone would struggle to pick up everyone's voices. This microphone worked perfectly in our first hybrid session this week. The USB cable that comes with it is nice and long too.

reviews.reviewTitle: prezzo contenuto, prestazioni più che soddisfacenti
reviews.reviewText: utilizzato per call di gruppo, in ambiente ampio e con una diecina di partecipanti in diretta: riceve e trasmette i dialoghi anche di persone poste a distanza di circa 2/2.5 metri
Produit fiable utilisé 5 heures minimum chaque semaine avec zoom.C'est le 2eme que j'achète (offert à un ami)Je recommande
